summary: Total overhaul for Skyrim. Changes skyrim into oblivion look.
descriptionHtml:
[b]For a short gameplay look here:[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wkdnir4MU-g

[color=red][b]******************************* DOOMED WORLD *******************************[/b][/color]

Gates of Oblivion has been closed but world still bares burden of the old times. Influence which gates had on this world call changes to its look. Transformation of water, sky and even trees. Mehrunes Dagon has left this dimension but there are still his deadric servants left. This World - Doomed World is dangerous and you will never know what will happen.

[b]What does it actually change? :)[/b]
-sky color 
-planets color
-adds animated red sky (beautifull at night in game :) )
-changes lod [color=yellow](not finished)[/color]
-water color into \'blood like\'
-ground textures
-plants
-grass
-lightning effects
-clouds
-And adds a little surprise for you guys :)

[b]My Optional ENB modification overrides Sharpshooters settings[/b]
(you have to download it from his nexus page). 
-Changes lighning so the game looks even more [color=red][b]bloody and gore[/b][/color]
-adds more clouds

[color=red][b]******************************* Installation ***********************************************[/b][/color]

-Just unpack all files from .rar into your Data folder. 
-Trun on mod in your mod menager.

[color=red][b]******************************* Requirements *******************************************[/b][/color]
Your game need latest update by Bethesda.

Optional:
Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics Vision ENB http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105



[color=red][b]******************************* Permission *******************************[/b][/color]

Want to use - pm me and give me credit.

[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/b9iyif.jpg[/img]



Sorry for my English. I know its not perfect.

Pozdrowienia dla polak√≥w :)
author: Broliii
